name: Ghost Sweeper Kotonoha
description:
Sisters VS Ghosts!

How to play:

　←→　Move

　↑　Jump or Arial Action

　↓　Switch Sisters

　Attention!
　You can see the ghosts with Aoi (Blue girl) but can only beat them with Akane (Red girl)!

Note:

　This is developed for GhostJam: https://itch.io/jam/ghost-jam

　Though we have decided to continue updating this game!

Developers:
　Game Programming: @KaifuKM: https://twitter.com/KaifuKM
　Art Designer: tamata31145: https://twitter.com/tamata31145
